original: 只見呂布拉弓如秋月行天，飛箭如流星落地，一箭正中畫戟，紀靈和劉備與眾人大為驚嘆，紀靈既已答應，自然也無法反悔。
text: I saw Lubula's bow like an autumn moon traveling in the sky, flying arrows like a falling star, and a halberd in the middle of the arrow. Ji Ling and Liu Bei were amazed by everyone. Since Ji Ling has agreed, naturally they can't regret it.
